metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: JSON - Introduction
JSON stands for J ava S cript O bject N otation
content.html: JSON stands for JavaScript Object Notation

content.text: JSON is a text format for storing and transporting data
content.html: JSON is a text format for storing and transporting data

content.text: JSON is "self-describing" and easy to understand
content.html: JSON is "self-describing" and easy to understand

content.text: JSON Example
This example is a JSON string:
content.html: This example is a JSON string:

content.code_html: '{"name":"John", "age":30, "car":null}'

content.text: It defines an object with 3 properties:
content.html: It defines an object with 3 properties:

content.text: Each property has a value.
content.html: Each property has a value.

content.text: If you parse the JSON string with a JavaScript program, you can access the data as an object:
content.html: If you parse the JSON string with a JavaScript program, you can access the data as an object:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
let personName = obj.name;
let personAge = obj.age;

content.code:
let personName = obj.name;
let personAge = obj.age;

syntax_highlighting.text:
let personName = obj.name;
let personAge = obj.age;

content.code_html:
let personName = obj.name;
let personAge = obj.age;

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
let personName = obj.name;
let personAge = obj.age;

content.text: What is JSON?
* The JSON syntax is derived from JavaScript object notation, but the JSON format is text only.
content.html:
*
The JSON syntax is derived from JavaScript object notation, but the JSON format is text only.

content.text: Code for reading and generating JSON exists in many programming languages.
content.html: Code for reading and generating JSON exists in many programming languages.

content.text: The JSON format was originally specified by Douglas Crockford .
content.html: The JSON format was originally specified by Douglas Crockford.

content.text: Why Use JSON?
The JSON format is syntactically similar to the code for creating JavaScript objects. Because of this, a JavaScript program can easily convert JSON data into JavaScript objects.
content.html: The JSON format is syntactically similar to the code for creating JavaScript objects. Because of this, a JavaScript program can easily convert JSON data into JavaScript objects.

content.text: Since the format is text only, JSON data can easily be sent between computers, and used by any programming language.
content.html: Since the format is text only, JSON data can easily be sent between computers, and used by any programming language.

content.text: JavaScript has a built in function for converting JSON strings into JavaScript objects:
content.html: JavaScript has a built in function for converting JSON strings into JavaScript objects:

content.text: JSON.parse()
content.html: JSON.parse()

content.text: JavaScript also has a built in function for converting an object into a JSON string:
content.html: JavaScript also has a built in function for converting an object into a JSON string:

content.text: JSON.stringify()
content.html: JSON.stringify()

content.text: You can receive pure text from a server and use it as a JavaScript object.
content.html: You can receive pure text from a server and use it as a JavaScript object.

content.text: You can send a JavaScript object to a server in pure text format.
content.html: You can send a JavaScript object to a server in pure text format.

content.text: You can work with data as JavaScript objects, with no complicated parsing and translations.
content.html: You can work with data as JavaScript objects, with no complicated parsing and translations.

content.text: Storing Data
When storing data, the data has to be a certain format, and regardless of where you choose to store it, text is always one of the legal formats.
content.html: When storing data, the data has to be a certain format, and regardless of where you choose to store it, text is always one of the legal formats.

content.text: JSON makes it possible to store JavaScript objects as text.
content.html: JSON makes it possible to store JavaScript objects as text.
